name: Space Chaos (itch) (DEFALTUSER)
description:
This is the first game i made at school.

HUD is pretty bugged because back then i didn't know how to tweak the hud, i recommend you to play it on fullscreen.

CONTROLS:

Use WASD / arrows to move the spaceship, press/hold SPACE to shoot your current weapon and use Q/E to switch weapons between "Machine Gun" and "Missiles"
